message.content:
cs.CL, cs.SI, cs.IR, cs.SD, cs.CY

This paper deals with the classification of news articles and the study of the phenomenon that helps spread fake news. It also discusses the sentiment behind internet claims and their credibility. Based on this, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language) as it deals with natural language processing and sentiment analysis. The paper also involves data collection and predictive modeling, which falls under cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) and cs.IR (Information Retrieval). The study of the psychology/mentality of people to understand why fake news spreads faster than reality can be categorized under cs.SD (Sound and Music Computing) and cs.CY (Computers and Society).
